events.title: Panel session "Accelerated learning: Threats and Opportunities of GPT in education"
events.description: The learning process is a complex social process and third-party interaction plays a key role in data exchange. GPT Chat improves processing efficiency, personalizes courses, empowers presenters, participates in group discussions, makes it easy to participate and co-create content - developing ideas and enriching your educational experience. At the same time, these advantages bring together pedagogical, organizational and ethical challenges. Can bans lower AI policy? Will it lead to staff cuts in the organization? How does AI affect sociology, pedagogy and business models in traditional educational organizations?

The session convenes key stakeholders, including established venture capitalists, industry veterans, and experienced executives, to examine the transformative impact of investments on the regional gaming landscape.This session provides a special chance for people who want to start investing in the gaming industry and those who want to understand how investments work. People who want to invest and game developers who want to get investments for their projects will learn practical ideas about investment strategies, trends, and successful methods. Don't miss the opportunity to explore the changing investment situation in Central Asia's active gaming industry

events.title: Meet the Drapers
events.description: "Meet the Drapers" is a reality show in which technology startups from around the world are selected to pitch their project to Tim Draper and his family. Startups compete with each other to advance to the next stage. At the season finale, only one project will have a chance to win $1 million in investment from Draper's private foundation. This is a great opportunity to show your startup to a global audience and get the investments!
